title: Universe’s Most Famous Vinegar Goddess - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Adapted to Manhua   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   College/University   Complex Family Relationships   Cute Protagonist   Modern Day   Showbiz   Tragic Past
author: Yè Sè   叶涩
description:
Everyone in the entertainment industry knows that Xiao Fengyu is an optimistic, cheerful and generous person who’s not affected by anything.

In an interview, the host asked: “Is there anything that will make you furious?”

Xiao Fengyu smiled generously, “How come? I have been in the industry for ten years, what other big storm have I not witnessed?”

The host was about to praise Fengyu for her knowledge and open-mindedness, but her smile gradually faded away.

Everyone looked behind.

Outside the filming area, the actress He Yunhan who came to visit the session, was gazing down and talking to a young and beautiful singer.

When the camera was aimed back at Xiao Fengyu, she indifferently said, “I’m sorry, I’m going to be furious.”

Moderator: “. . .”

Audience: “. . .”>
